import"./Input.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from'axios';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Input(){// Define state variables to hold input values
const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[author,setAuthor]=useState('');const[blog,setBlog]=useState('');const isFormValid=()=>{return title.trim()!==''&&author.trim()!==''&&blog.trim()!=='';};const handleClick=()=>{axios.post('http://localhost:4000/api/workouts',{title:title,author:author,blog:blog}).then(response=>{console.log(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Input",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"writeForm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"writeFormGroup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"writeInput writeTitle",placeholder:"Title",type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),autoFocus:true,required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"writeFormGroup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"writeInput writeAuthor",placeholder:"Your Name",type:"text",value:author,onChange:e=>setAuthor(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"writeFormGroup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"writeInput writeText",placeholder:"Write your blog...",type:"text",value:blog,onChange:e=>setBlog(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"writeSubmit",type:"button",onClick:handleClick,disabled:!isFormValid(),children:"Submit"})})]})});}
